Oral Prednisolone Baseline Coverage.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Target Coverage.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Start Year.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Scale-Up Final Year.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Oral Prednisolone Population In Need.description: The proportion of persons who require the intervention

Oral Prednisolone Disability Impact.description: The proportion by which the disability weight is reduced due to the intervention
